title: Run Away, From Me - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Cruel Characters   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Possessive Characters   Royalty
author: 성혜림
description:
The Crown Prince who returned from the war was simply a perfect man. 

Black hair that was darker than night, green eyes like summer forest. 

His beautiful face was like a god of war. 

Everyone was fascinated by him. 

Everyone obeyed him. 

He was the absolute ruler of all. 

And I was no exception. 

He was a destroyer who brutally broke the beautiful world.

He was a butcher who trampled on my life.>
